name: mercator/gallery
title: Mercator Gallery
description: Mercator Gallery for Pagekit is a gallery extensions based on UIKit3. Please note that the 'mode' keyword now only accepts 'lightbox', 'slider', 'randomimage', 'accordion-slider' and 'accordion-lightbox'. Make sure to use these when calling the extension. See the README at https://github.com/helmutkaufmann/Mercator-Gallery for details.
